title: Second Sri Lanka-India T20I postponed
paragraphs: The second T20I between Sri Lanka and India, which was initially scheduled to be played today (27) has been postponed to tomorrow (28)after India allrounder Krunal Pandya tested positive for COVID-19 ahead of the game, the Sri Lanka Cricket said.

"Following the Rapid Antigen Tests conducted ahead of the match this morning, Team India all-rounder Krunal Pandya was found to be positive. The Medical Teams have identified eight members as close contacts," it said in a statement.
"The entire contingent is undergoing RT-PCR tests today to ascertain any further outbreak in the squad," the statement added.
